content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.13A > Section 74.13A.065 74.13A.060 << 74.13A.065 >> 74.13A.070 PDF RCW 74.13A.065 Records — Confidentiality. The secretary shall keep such general records as are needed to evaluate the effectiveness of the program of adoption support authorized by RCW 26.33.320 and * 74.13.100 through 74.13.145 in encouraging and effectuating the adoption of hard to place children. In so doing the secretary shall, however, maintain the confidentiality required by law with respect to particular adoptions. [ 1985 c 7 s 143 ; 1971 ex.s. c 63 s 13 . Formerly RCW 74.13.133 .] NOTES: *Reviser's note: RCW 74.13.100 through 74.13.145 were recodified as RCW 74.13A.005 through 74.13A.080 pursuant to 2009 c 520 s 95 .
